text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSPatientSummary

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSPatientSummary 0..*EHDSDocumentPatient summary model

Elements defined in Ancestors:header, header, presentedForm
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
alerts 1..1BaseSection: Alerts.
narrative 0..1stringNarrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
emptyReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data
medicalAlert 0..*EHDSAlertDescription of medical alerts in textual format: any clinical information that is imperative to know so that the life or health of the patient does not come under threat.
allergiesAndIntolerances 1..1BaseSection: Allergies and intolerances
narrative 1..1stringText summary of the content in section
allergyIntolerance 0..*EHDSAllergyIntoleranceList of structured allergies and intolerances
emptyReason 0..1CodeableConceptUse if no Allergies are listed
Binding Description: (preferred): 1.3.6.1.4.1.12559.11.10.1.3.1.42.47eHDSIAbsentOrUnknownAllergy; http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-empty-reason
problems 1..1BaseMedical problems.
narrative 0..1stringText summary of the content in the section
emptyReason 0..1CodeableConceptUse if no conditions are listed
problems 0..*EHDSCondition!!Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.!!
medicationSummary 1..1BaseSection: Medication Summary.
narrative 0..1stringText summary of the content in the section
emptyReason 0..1CodeableConceptUse if no medicines are listed
medicationTreatment 0..*EHDSMedicationStatementMedication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.
medicalDevicesAndImplants 1..1BaseSection: Medical devices and implants
narrative 0..1stringNarrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
emptyReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data
medicalDevice 0..*EHDSDeviceUseDescribes the patient's implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.
procedures 1..1BaseSection: Procedures
narrative 0..1stringNarrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
emptyReason 0..1CodeableConceptReason for absence of data
procedure 0..*EHDSProcedureList of procedures
vaccination 0..1BaseSection: Vaccination/prophylaxis.
narrative 0..1stringNarrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
vaccination 0..*EHDSImmunisationImmunisations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.
functionalStatus 0..1BaseSection: Functional status
narrative 0..1stringNarrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
functionalStatusAssessment 0..*EHDSFunctionalStatusAn individual's ability to perform normal daily activities required to meet basic needs, fulfil usual roles and maintain health and well-being
socialHistory 0..1BaseSection: Social history.
narrative 0..1stringNarrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
socialHistoryObservation 0..*EHDSSocialHistorySocial history observations related to health
pregnancyHistory 0..1BaseSection: Pregnancy history
generatedNarrative 0..1stringGenerated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation
currentPregnancyStatus 0..1EHDSCurrentPregnancyCurrent pregnancy status
previousPregnanciesStatus 0..1CodeableConceptOverall status of previous pregnancies
previousPregnancies 0..*EHDSPregnancyHistoryHistory of previous pregnancies
travelHistory 0..1BaseRelevant information about the patient's recent travel history
narrative 0..1stringText summary of the content in the section
travelHistory 0..*EHDSTravelHistoryTravel history for one country
patientStory 0..1BaseWhat the patient believes to be important for the attending clinician to know.
narrative 0..1stringText summary of the content in the section
advanceDirectives 0..1BaseSection: Advance Directives.
narrative 0..1stringNarrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
advanceDirective 0..*EHDSAdvanceDirectiveProvision for healthcare decisions if, in the future, a person is unable to make those decisions
results 0..1BaseSection: Observation results.
narrative 0..1stringNarrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
resultObservation[x] 0..*Observation results pertaining to the subject of care's health condition and which might have impact on future treatments
resultObservationEHDSObservationEHDSObservation
resultObservationEHDSLaboratoryObservationEHDSLaboratoryObservation
carePlan 0..1BaseSection: Care plans.
narrative 0..1stringNarrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.
carePlanEntry 0..*EHDSCarePlanDescribes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSPatientSummary
title: Patient summary model
description: EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary

element.short: Patient summary model
element.definition: EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary

element.short: Document header elements
element.definition: Common header for all patient-related data

element.short: Patient/subject information
element.definition: Patient/subject information

element.short: Unique identifier of the document
element.definition: Business identifier for the object

element.short: Resource authoring details
element.definition: Resource authoring details

element.short: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
element.definition: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

element.short: Date and time of authoring/issuing
element.definition: Date and time of authoring/issuing

element.short: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).
element.definition: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

element.short: Status of the resource or document
element.definition: Status of the resource or document

element.short: Reason for the current status of the resource.
element.definition: Reason for the current status of the resource.

element.short: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
element.definition: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

element.short: Type of document at hand, e.g. 60591-5 Patient summary document.
element.definition: Type of document at hand, e.g. 60591-5 Patient summary document.

element.short: Human readable document title that can be displayed in search results, etc. This can be documentType's display name, or it can be assembled from multiple elements. Examples: 'Laboratory Result Report', 'Patient Summary of Jane Green 10.12.2024'
element.definition: Human readable document title that can be displayed in search results, etc. This can be documentType's display name, or it can be assembled from multiple elements. Examples: 'Laboratory Result Report', 'Patient Summary of Jane Green 10.12.2024'

element.short: Time of service that is being documented
element.definition: Time of service that is being documented

element.short: Business version of the document.
element.definition: Business version of the document.

element.short: Document attestation details
element.definition: Document attestation details

element.short: Attester who validated the document. Mulitple attesters could be provided.
element.definition: Attester who validated the document. Mulitple attesters could be provided.

element.short: Date and time of the approval of the document by Attester.
element.definition: Date and time of the approval of the document by Attester.

element.short: Document legal authentication details
element.definition: Document legal authentication details

element.short: The person taking responsibility for the medical content of the document
element.definition: The person taking responsibility for the medical content of the document

element.short: Date and time when the document was authorised.
element.definition: Date and time when the document was authorised.

element.short: Categorisation of the event covered by the document (e.g. laboratory study types, imaging study types including modality, etc.). Selection of such tags or labels depends on the use case and agreement between data sharing parties. This meta-data element serves primarily for searching and filtering purposes.
element.definition: Categorisation of the event covered by the document (e.g. laboratory study types, imaging study types including modality, etc.). Selection of such tags or labels depends on the use case and agreement between data sharing parties. This meta-data element serves primarily for searching and filtering purposes.

element.short: Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)
element.definition: Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

element.short: Organisation that is in charge of maintaining the document/report.
element.definition: Organisation that is in charge of maintaining the document/report.

element.short: Level of confidentiality of the document. Implicit value is normal.
element.definition: Level of confidentiality of the document. Implicit value is normal.

element.short: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document
element.definition: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

element.short: Section: Alerts.
element.definition: Information about substantial alerts or warnings that health professionals should be aware of.
element.requirements: eHN PS Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS

element.short: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
element.definition: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

element.short: Reason for absence of data
element.definition: Reason for absence of data

element.short: Description of medical alerts in textual format: any clinical information that is imperative to know so that the life or health of the patient does not come under threat.
element.definition: Description of medical alerts in textual format: any clinical information that is imperative to know so that the life or health of the patient does not come under threat.

element.short: Section: Allergies and intolerances
element.definition: Section: Allergies and intolerances
element.requirements: eHN PS Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS

element.short: Text summary of the content in section
element.definition: Text summary of the content in section

element.short: List of structured allergies and intolerances
element.definition: List of structured allergies and intolerances
element.requirements: eHN PS Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS

element.short: Use if no Allergies are listed
element.definition: Reason for absence of data (indicates whether the person is known to have no allergies or the data is considered incomplete)
element.requirements: This element is present in MyHealth@EU specifications and ISO IPS. The proposed way of modelling is identical to the newest version of FHIR IPS IG. See general description of Patient summary modelling for more information about this element. MH@EU has a similar concept, but it is modelled in slightly different way.

element.short: Medical problems.
element.definition: Conditions that are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter.

element.short: Text summary of the content in the section
element.definition: Text summary of the content in the section

element.short: Use if no conditions are listed
element.definition: Use if no conditions are listed

element.short: !!Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.!!
element.definition: !!Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.!!

element.short: Section: Medication Summary.
element.definition: Current and relevant past medicine.

element.short: Text summary of the content in the section
element.definition: Text summary of the content in the section

element.short: Use if no medicines are listed
element.definition: Use if no medicines are listed

element.short: Medication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.
element.definition: Medication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.

element.short: Section: Medical devices and implants
element.definition: Section: Medical devices and implants

element.short: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
element.definition: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

element.short: Reason for absence of data
element.definition: Reason for absence of data

element.short: Describes the patient's implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.
element.definition: Describes the patient's implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.

element.short: Section: Procedures
element.definition: Section: Procedures

element.short: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
element.definition: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

element.short: Reason for absence of data
element.definition: Reason for absence of data

element.short: List of procedures
element.definition: List of procedures

element.short: Section: Vaccination/prophylaxis.
element.definition: A patient's immunisation status. The section should include current immunization status and may contain the entire immunization history that is relevant to the period of time being summarised. Adverse reactions against vaccines should be documented in the allergy section.

element.short: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
element.definition: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

element.short: Immunisations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.
element.definition: Immunisations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.

element.short: Section: Functional status
element.definition: Section: Functional status
element.requirements: eHN PS Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS

element.short: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
element.definition: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

element.short: An individual's ability to perform normal daily activities required to meet basic needs, fulfil usual roles and maintain health and well-being
element.definition: An individual's ability to perform normal daily activities required to meet basic needs, fulfil usual roles and maintain health and well-being

element.short: Section: Social history.
element.definition: Observations on social factors such as alcohol consumption or smoking. From the healthcare perspective, life-style factors relate to well-being but can also provide a source of risk factors.
element.requirements: eHN PS Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS

element.short: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
element.definition: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

element.short: Social history observations related to health
element.definition: Health related lifestyle factors or lifestyle observations and social determinants of health. Example: cigarette smoker, alcohol consumption
element.requirements: eHN PS Guideline, MyHealth@EU, ISO IPS

element.short: Section: Pregnancy history
element.definition: To present the current health state of the patient with respect to pregnancy and to provide chronological and outcome information about past pregnancies.

element.short: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation
element.definition: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation

element.short: Current pregnancy status
element.definition: Current state of the pregnancy at the date the observation was made, e.g. pregnant, not pregnant, unknown.

element.short: Overall status of previous pregnancies
element.definition:
Overall status of previous pregnancies, including 
— Yes, previous pregnancies 
— No, previous pregnancies 
— Unknown

element.short: History of previous pregnancies
element.definition: Information about previous pregnancies, including outcomes and number of children/fetuses in each pregnancy.

element.short: Relevant information about the patient's recent travel history
element.definition: Captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.

element.short: Text summary of the content in the section
element.definition: Text summary of the content in the section

element.short: Travel history for one country
element.definition: Travel history for one country

element.short: What the patient believes to be important for the attending clinician to know.
element.definition: A concise narrative from the patient’s perspective about their present health state. This is a record of the things that a person feels it is important to communicate about their needs, strengths, values, concerns and preferences to others providing support and care.

element.short: Text summary of the content in the section
element.definition: Text summary of the content in the section

element.short: Section: Advance Directives.
element.definition: Provision for healthcare decisions if, in the future, a person is unable to make those decisions.

element.short: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
element.definition: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

element.short: Provision for healthcare decisions if, in the future, a person is unable to make those decisions
element.definition: Provision for healthcare decisions if, in the future, a person is unable to make those decisions

element.short: Section: Observation results.
element.definition: Relevant observation results obtained on the patient. These may be measurements, laboratory results, anatomic pathology results, radiology results or other imaging or clinical results.

element.short: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section
element.definition: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

element.short: Observation results pertaining to the subject of care's health condition and which might have impact on future treatments
element.definition: Observation results pertaining to the subject of care's health condition and which might have impact on future treatments

element.short: Section: Care plans.
element.definition: Therapeutic recommendations that do not include pharmacologic treatments, such as diet, physical exercise, planned surgeries

element.short: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.
element.definition: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.

element.short: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.
element.definition: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.
